subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Larsen, whose habit of tapping things earned him the nickname Tappy, won the precursor to the United States Open in 1950 and was inducted into the Tennis Hall of Fame in 1969.
snippet: Mr. Larsen, whose habit of tapping things earned him the nickname Tappy, won the precursor to the United States Open in 1950 and was inducted into the Tennis Hall of Fame in 1969.
